snippet: Two top editors of The Village Voice are departing, and the newspaper is moving out of the building where it has had its headquarters for two decades.
abstract: Two top editors of The Village Voice are departing, and the newspaper is moving out of the building where it has had its headquarters for two decades.

byline.original: By DAVID CARR and BEN SISARIO

headline.main: Village Voice Is Losing Its Editor in Chief and Music Editor
headline.print_headline: Village Voice Is Losing Its Editor in Chief and Music Editor
